Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.examples.power.random

Class Summary
Dvfs A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that only applied DVFS, but no dynamic optimization of the VM allocation.
IqrMc A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Inter Quartile Range (IQR) VM allocation policy and Maximum Correlation (MC) VM selection policy.
IqrMmt A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Inter Quartile Range (IQR) VM allocation policy and Minimum Migration Time (MMT) VM selection policy.
IqrMu A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Inter Quartile Range (IQR) VM allocation policy and Minimum Utilization (MU) VM selection policy.
IqrRs A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Inter Quartile Range (IQR) VM allocation policy and Random Selection (RS) VM selection policy.
LrMc A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Local Regression (LR) VM allocation policy and Maximum Correlation (MC) VM selection policy.
LrMmt A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Local Regression (LR) VM allocation policy and Minimum Migration Time (MMT) VM selection policy.
LrMu A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Local Regression (LR) VM allocation policy and Minimum Utilization (MU) VM selection policy.
LrrMc A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Local Regression Robust (LRR) VM allocation policy and Maximum Correlation (MC) VM selection policy.
LrrMmt A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Local Regression Robust (LRR) VM allocation policy and Minimum Migration Time (MMT) VM selection policy.
LrrMu A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Local Regression Robust (LRR) VM allocation policy and Minimum Utilization (MU) VM selection policy.
LrrRs A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Local Regression Robust (LRR) VM allocation policy and Random Selection (RS) VM selection policy.
LrRs A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Local Regression (LR) VM allocation policy and Random Selection (RS) VM selection policy.
MadMc A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Median Absolute Deviation (MAD) VM allocation policy and Maximum Correlation (MC) VM selection policy.
MadMmt A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Median Absolute Deviation (MAD) VM allocation policy and Minimum Migration Time (MMT) VM selection policy.
MadMu A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Median Absolute Deviation (MAD) VM allocation policy and Minimum Utilization (MU) VM selection policy.
MadRs A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Median Absolute Deviation (MAD) VM allocation policy and Random Selection (RS) VM selection policy.
NonPowerAware A simulation of a heterogeneous non-power aware data center: all hosts consume maximum power all the time.
RandomConstants If you are using any algorithms, policies or workload included in the power package please cite the following paper: Anton Beloglazov, and Rajkumar Buyya, "Optimal Online Deterministic Algorithms and Adaptive Heuristics for Energy and Performance Efficient Dynamic Consolidation of Virtual Machines in Cloud Data Centers", Concurrency and Computation: Practice and Experience, ISSN: 1532-0626, Wiley Press, New York, USA, 2011, DOI: 10.1002/cpe.1867
RandomHelper The Helper class for the random workload.
RandomRunner The example runner for the random workload.
ThrMc A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Static Threshold (THR) VM allocation policy and Maximum Correlation (MC) VM selection policy.
ThrMmt A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Static Threshold (THR) VM allocation policy and Minimum Migration Time (MMT) VM selection policy.
ThrMu A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Static Threshold (THR) VM allocation policy and Minimum Utilization (MU) VM selection policy.
ThrRs A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Static Threshold (THR) VM allocation policy and Random Selection (RS) VM selection policy.
